Field Detail

DEFAULT_CITY_SIZE

public static final double DEFAULT_CITY_SIZE
The default size of a place=city that has no defining polygon but only a center-point. See Map_Features#Places on the OSM-Wiki for details.

See Also:
getPlaceBounds(Node), Constant Field Values

findSuburbsAndCities

public java.util.Collection<Place> findSuburbsAndCities(java.lang.String aCityName)
Find all suburbs and cities without suburbs that match the given name.

Parameters:

Returns:
the suburbs found and the cities with no suburbs. Never null but may be empty.
